For this recipe, it's

And since butter gets rather

We're starting with eight
ounces of unsalted butter,
6 1/2 ounces if you browned it beforehand

We're going to soften it up a little bit

of granulated sugar,
and 9 3/4 ounces of light brown sugar.
Then we're creaming those together

until the mixture
becomes light and fluffy.

Scrape off the paddle and
down the sides of the bowl.
And then we can get to adding our eggs.
Two large eggs, added one at a time

egg is fully incorporated

Scrape down the paddle and the

And then it's time to introduce

In a separate bowl, we are
